entry.title: Honey, just put your sweet lips on my lips
entry.summary:
Author: sapphicmoonlover

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,056Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “You know, you could always kiss me.”And Buck was wrong before. He felt fine then compared to the immediate sickness that now settles in his stomach. He feels his cheeks heating up and then prays he will pass out.Idiot, fucking idiot. Why? Why would he even say that?He doesn’t look at Eddie, even when he feels the latter's eyes burning into the side of his face. He doesn’t move his foot, doesn’t do anything. He mildly wonders if he’s still enough, maybe Eddie would forget he was there completely.He thinks he may have heard Eddie choke on air, but then again, Buck is now actively trying not to think. About anything at all.He cannot believe he just offered himself to his no longer straight best friend. What an idiot.“Um. What?”*Or, Buck offers to kiss Eddie after he comes out. Eddie says no, and Buck spirals.

entry.title: Hunger for you
entry.summary:
Author: LunaDusktreader

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,201Chapters: 25/36Kudos: 28

Summary: Buck has always known that the chemistry between him and Eddie was undeniable, but he never imagined that a simple moment of care could ignite such intense and forbidden desire. When Eddie begins to deal with the unexpected effects of lactation, the discomfort quickly turns into something new – a need that awakens unfamiliar sensations.At first, it is just an innocent touch, a gesture of support. But when Buck notices the way Eddie reacts, their gazes linger, their touches become more lingering, and the tension between them becomes impossible to ignore. Between hesitant whispers and bodies seeking each other, they discover a shared pleasure that scares and excites them in equal measure.What began as a moment of vulnerability turns into an explosion of desire and connection. But are they ready to accept what this means for the relationship they have built? Between surrender and uncertainty, Buck and Eddie will discover that, sometimes, hunger goes far beyond what can be controlled.

entry.title: Us Against the World
entry.summary:
Author: NyotaGirl

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,122Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 71

Summary: Bobby looks at the kid."So what's the long story?"“My girlfriend, well…not really my girlfriend. We hooked up a few times and now she’s…uh…pregnant. Five months along. She said she doesn’t want the baby. She has never wanted kids. She found out too late to abort, she said. We were together in Peru, and I was actually planning to go to LA with some buddies of mine when she dropped the bombshell. I…"OR:Bobby meets Buck in Minnesota after he has lost his family, ends up adopting an adult, and somehow becomes a grandpa. Their chance meeting changes everything for both of them.

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,069Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 158

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until Buck's letters start getting sadder, wondering why his sister won't reply to him.

entry.title: Inferno
entry.summary:
Author: sleeptokensdaredevil

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,736Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 12

Summary: The heat of the fire was already starting to make me sweat, even through my turnout gear. Three other firefighters rushed by running back into the burning warehouse. I heard that there were at least twenty-five people still inside, and didn't know how the hell we were going to get them all out in time. Buck threw on his helmet and the rest of his gear and I watched his every move as he ran into the burning building. "Cora!" My head whipped towards Bobby, who was staring right back at me, he showed a slight reassuring smile as I grabbed the rest of my gear and threw it on, rushing into the building right behind him.----"Need a little help here." My head whipped around to the direction I thought the voice came from, not knowing who the hell was speaking or who they were talking to. The voice sounded deep, I could tell it was a man, and it sounded like he was struggling. I stopped as I saw a girl no older than ten being carried by the man in a full black outfit, his eyes covered by a piece of cloth."You have got to be fucking kidding me."

entry.title: Instead:
entry.summary:
Author: swift_directioner13
